entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 p.m. PDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 12.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 12:00 AM PDT Friday 12 May 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 12.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low 9.
